article_title: Earth Day plants the seed for environmental care
article_text:
Thank you for reading HeraldMailMedia.com free articles on our site. og.description: “Think globally, act locally.”—RenéDubos On Friday, April 22, the United States will celebrate its 46th Earth Day.Earth Day was incubated in the environmental and political turbulence of the 1960s. Rachel Carson’s 1962 wake-up call“Silent Spring”
